title: Topic 001 Question 024
body: You have a Microsoft 365 subscription that contains 1,000 Windows 10 devices. The devices have Microsoft Office 365 installed.
You need to mitigate the following device threats:
✑ Microsoft Excel macros that download scripts from untrusted websites
✑ Users that open executable attachments in Microsoft Outlook
options: attack surface reduction rules in Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
adaptive application control in Azure Defender
